conbody.p: The Throughput widget displays a time series of throughput statistics for a system. You can consult the throughput for write operations (dark blue graphics) as well as read operations (light blue graphics). Throughput performance

On top of the System Health page you can define the date range for which you want to analyze the throughput. In the widget itself you can refine your selection by zooming in on the graphic. Click Reset zoom to return to the default zoom level of the selected date range.
